mapper.select: select rownum num,moviename,thumnail,moviestars,opendate,hit,rate,genre,nation,modate from movies where num < 11 order by num desc
select * from (select rownum num,moviename,thumnail,moviestars,opendate,hit,rate,genre,nation,modate from movies where rate = '12' or rate = '전체관람가') mo where mo.num < 11 order by num desc
select * from (select rownum num,moviename,thumnail,moviestars,opendate,hit,rate,genre,nation,modate from movies where genre = '공포/스릴러') mo where mo.num < 11 order by num desc
select * from (select rownum num,moviename,thumnail,moviestars,opendate,hit,rate,genre,nation,modate from movies where nation = '한국') mo where mo.num < 11 order by num desc
select mo.* from (select num,moviename,thumnail,moviestars,opendate,rate,genre,nation,modate, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by hit desc) as rk from movies) mo where mo.rk<10 order by mo.rk desc
select * from slidetitle where num > #{no} and num <= #{no}+5
